title: What to Read This Week
sub_head: Our Summer Books edition features a wealth of vacation-ready reading, including inspirations for travel and fun. Plus a portrait of our patchwork national origins and more.
body:
In the beginning, America was less a country than a collection of states. Review by Gordon S. Wood
Read the review
What monuments around the world say about how a global conflict is remembered. Review by Michael S. Roth
Read the review
